items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t very surprised that that happened.
Tom wants to see a doctor as soon as possible.
Tom was a lot shorter than me in kindergarten.
Tom was afraid of being captured by the enemy.
Many students live in the suburbs of the city.
Do you know the reason why he cut class today?
Do you know the reason why the sky looks blue?
Do you know what time that supermarket closes?
Tom said that he didn\'t know Mary\'s address.
I\'ve never seen a plane fly over this island.
